item.title: G(odot) U(nit) T(esting) and Github Actions
item.description: I had previously already added unit tests to my game. There’s already a fair few youtube videos and guides out there describing how to do this. What I wasn’t aware of is that it is actually particularly easy to setup godot automated testing (GUT) upon pushing code into github using github actions. Log into you github account and create a new action workflow. Then add the following at the bottom of the blank.
